Brad - This word can refer to a thin, flat piece of metal used as a fastener or a small, pointed nail
True blue: Cerulean is a blue-green hue, often used to describe something that is true and trustworthy
The Pyramids of Giza - These ancient pyramids are one of the most recognizable symbols of Egypt and a must-visit attraction for any traveler to Cairo.
